title: Best Beer Bars in the World!!
name: Best Beer Bars in the World!!
description: As I travel the world I seek out interesting places to drink.  These are some of the best!  I have made this an ordered list with my personal #1 at the top.

properties.name: Aba-jour
properties.description: Aba-jour Nice bar. Not going to get too highly recommended, but as bars go in the world this is a good one. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Armsby Abbey
properties.description: Armsby Abbey Six Belgian beer taps, great bottle selection and slow food makes this a great place to visit! Owner Alec and his wife can be found behind the bar most nights. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: BXL Cafe
properties.description: BXL Cafe Love the Belgian beer taps and food! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Bakusyu Club Popeye
properties.description: Bakusyu Club Popeye Try their Black IPA. Nice bar. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Belga Queen
properties.description: Belga Queen Not your average old dirty smoky pub ... this is upscale bar with a good beer menu. They seem to get something unique on tap always! Worth the stop :) by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Belikin Beer
properties.description: Belikin Beer Okay, Not a pub recommendation. Plenty of places to find Belikin. Maybe not the best beer in the world, far from it, but the sun/beer/palm trees make it good! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Bleacher Bar @ Fenway
properties.description: Bleacher Bar @ Fenway No ticket, no problem. See the game from below the bleachers at the Bleacher Bar. by dougnboston From the guide: Fenway Park: Things you may not know!

properties.name: Blind Tiger
properties.description: Blind Tiger Wonderful bar with a fun crowd. Beer is carefully selected and served. Good stuff. by dougnboston From the guide: NYC the way I like it

properties.name: Brasserie Thiriez
properties.description: Brasserie Thiriez A French brewery with a great tasting room. It's a one man show that brews great beers. Well worth a visit!!! Great tasting room. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Brasserie d'Orval
properties.description: Brasserie d'Orval You'd go to visit the Abbey d'Orval, but down the street a very short distance is the only place you can buy two varieties of Orval, one is made for the monks! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Brick Store Pub
properties.description: Brick Store Pub The real thing, great grub better beers. Two bars and lots of choice. Don't miss it. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: British Beer Company
properties.description: British Beer Company A growing chain that has several good beers. by dougnboston From the guide: Cape Cod, MA

properties.name: Burp Castle
properties.description: Burp Castle Solid Belgian Beer Bar with a great tap selection. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Cambrinus
properties.description: Cambrinus A really good beer selection and okay food. A newer bar, so not a lot of history but I'd go back. by dougnboston From the guide: Brugge, Belgium

properties.name: Charlie Mopps Public House
properties.description: Charlie Mopps Public House They have something like 80 working taps. Mostly domestic beers. No Belgians on tap that I found. I loved their Charlie Mopps Wet Dream. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Cittie of Yorke
properties.description: Cittie of Yorke Love this one. As comfortable today as it was many, many years ago. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Deep Ellum
properties.description: Deep Ellum Fantastic beers and really good food. Max runs a great place. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Den Trollekelder
properties.description: Den Trollekelder Gent (Ghent) Belgium. Yes, trolls in the window. This is a fantastic bar with multiple levels up and down. Great service and selection. by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Deschutes Brewery Portland Public House
properties.description: Deschutes Brewery Portland Public House An incredible lineup of great beers year in year out! For sure one of the best in the world. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Breweries in the World!!

properties.name: Dive Bar
properties.description: Dive Bar Easy to miss the bar, not well signed or even looking like they are open, but you gotta go if you love domestic high quality brews! No food, no credit cards! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Doyle's Cafe
properties.description: Doyle's Cafe Olde School Irish Pub with history and charm. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Dulle Griet
properties.description: Dulle Griet In Gent, Belgium a terrific bar that I went back to several times. 200 different beers. A challenge to pee, navigate a small spiral staircase upstairs. A must! by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Empire Tap Room
properties.description: Empire Tap Room Big bar and a really good menu. Several good taps. Not a top 20 but a good solid bar. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Favori
properties.description: Favori Terrific Belgian beer bar in Japan! Proper glasses and a staff that knows their beer. Get the passport. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Galgenhuisje
properties.description: Galgenhuisje It's the three windows at the base of this building ... small, small, small! Built in what were cells for the condemned. I loved it! by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Gingerman
properties.description: Gingerman Gingerman was my first NYC find! They have a major line-up of both micros and global beers. Food is good but the bar is happening. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Global Warming
properties.description: Global Warming Nice bar with quality beer line up in a beer starved Florida state. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Gouden Mandeke
properties.description: Gouden Mandeke Another terrific Ghent beer bar with a comfortable atmosphere. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Great Lost Bear
properties.description: Great Lost Bear Terrific place with a large selection of beers. All the Maine beers plus lots of other quality micros. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Half Moon Brewery - De Halve Maan
properties.description: Half Moon Brewery - De Halve Maan I had lunch here and really enjoyed it. They brew Bruges Zot! and Straffe Hendrik. Worth the visit. by dougnboston From the guide: Brugge, Belgium

properties.name: Hamilton's Tavern
properties.description: Hamilton's Tavern A hidden gem. Terrific line-up of domestic and Belgian brews. Take out food next door is served through a window in the bar :) Gotta love it. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Het Anker in Mechelen, Belgium
properties.description: Het Anker in Mechelen, Belgium A simple clean hotel, great brewery and wonderful restaurant/pub all together in one spot! I have found the staff to be very helpful. Open brew day 2/24. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Het Waterhuis aan de Bierkant
properties.description: Het Waterhuis aan de Bierkant In Gent, Belgium; Serving over 100 different Belgian beers, this is a classic bar that must be visited. by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Higgins Restaurant and Bar
properties.description: Higgins Restaurant and Bar Terrific beer line up and foods very good too! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Horseshoe Pub
properties.description: Horseshoe Pub Lots of taps but many macro's and could use an upgrade in service. 6/2009-was in the area and dropped in: Service much improved and tap selection was very good! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: In Der Vrede  - Westvelteren
properties.description: In Der Vrede - Westvelteren Westvelteren 12 is consistantly rated as one of, if not the, best beer in the world. So rare this may be the only place you'll get to try it! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Jacob Wirth Restaurant
properties.description: Jacob Wirth Restaurant Wicked old, wicked cool ... just wicked (as we say in Boston). Great beer list, both bottles and draft. Classics on the menu. Known locally as Jac'ys. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Jimmy's No. 43
properties.description: Jimmy's No. 43 Great bar, terrific beers. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: John Harvard's Brew House
properties.description: John Harvard's Brew House Honest Food, Real Beer ... for real. Love this place for a really good beer and quality (bar) food. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Kaffee De Hopduvel
properties.description: Kaffee De Hopduvel It's changed owners since I've been but it was known to have very slow service ... really slow ... but patience pays off. It's one to do!! by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Kulminator
properties.description: Kulminator Antwerpen, Belgium. This bar is in Antwerp and what makes it special are the aged beers. I had a 1972 Cardinal in the proper glass - a brewer that doesn't even exist today! Famous by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: La Trappe
properties.description: La Trappe A really terrific bar and an excellent selection of Belgian beers! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Liars Club
properties.description: Liars Club A bit of a trip out of the city, but a great beer hall! I will say I loved it best when on the beach, but now it's inland. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Los Gatos Brewing Company
properties.description: Los Gatos Brewing Company Good brews and a nice restaurant. Nothing over the top, but if you are in town it will do nicely. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Mitre House
properties.description: Mitre House Kind of hard to find, but a terrific pub when you get there. Seek it out! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Monk's Kettle
properties.description: Monk's Kettle Was really down on this place as I thought pours were short & prices high. A recent visit turned that all around. Great people, superior beers & fair prices. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Monks Belgian Cafe
properties.description: Monks Belgian Cafe Philadelphia, PA; One of the best in the US, two bars, clean yet atmosphere of old, fantastic selection of beers. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: O'Briens
properties.description: O'Briens Totally laid back and always something very special on the tap list as well as the bottles. Great beers and good food. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Old Bank Of England Pub, London
properties.description: Old Bank Of England Pub, London A majestic bar with a link to Sweeny Todd Meat Pies ... I think it's on the menu! Big and easy, love this pub. by dougnboston From the guide: An Historic London Pub Crawl!

properties.name: Old Monk
properties.description: Old Monk Nice old feel, very good beer line up and proper glassware for service. I liked the friendly customers and service was great. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: PRL Euro Cafe
properties.description: PRL Euro Cafe Florida is generally beer starved when it comes to quality beers. If you crave a Belgian beer this place will have several. Small and they still smoke inside. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Palace
properties.description: Palace The sign above the bar says "Keep Smiling" and we did. Nice bar, friendly staff in the middle of a sleepy town. This is hop country! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Pike Brewing Co
properties.description: Pike Brewing Co Well made local brews in the Pike Place Market. So after you watch the fish guys tossing fish at customers and digging into those little doughnuts, have a beer by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Pitcher's Pub
properties.description: Pitcher's Pub Well thought out selection of beers and an owner/manager that listens. Good pub grub. 22 taps, couple Belgian. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Poe's Tavern
properties.description: Poe's Tavern Outdoor/indoor bar. Nice atmosphere. Good selection. Best I've found in the area. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Poechenellekelder
properties.description: Poechenellekelder Near the Grote Markt in Brussels candles adorne this wonderful bar. I found the waitstaff to be friendly. Next to the Manneken Pis so stop in on your visit. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Portsmouth Brewery Restaurant
properties.description: Portsmouth Brewery Restaurant New Hampshires first brew pub and a sister organization to Smuttynose Brewery. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Queen Mary British Pub
properties.description: Queen Mary British Pub Nice looking place and it has some good beer, but not lots and it's a bit pricey per pint. Soccer games on TV all the time. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Quinten Matsijs
properties.description: Quinten Matsijs Built in 1565 and still running (Belgium's oldest!). Nice selection of beers, really nice people running it, and they have this old game played with metal slugs by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Red Lion
properties.description: Red Lion Love this quaint old pub ... a true pubs pub. 90% locals, very few tourists. Good food. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Red Lion Restaurant
properties.description: Red Lion Restaurant Indoor/Outdoor this is a hopping place in the evenings. Nice selection of beers tipping towards the local Colorado brews. Fat Tire is always a good choice. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Roadhouse BBQ
properties.description: Roadhouse BBQ A "this" and "that" set of bars, two, that are full of American quality micro's and some imports. Belgian's are up the street at Publick House. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Room
properties.description: Room Very narrow and illuminated by votive candles. Velvet couches and candles create ambience that has been described as Pottery Barn goes Goth. by dougnboston From the guide: NYC the way I like it

properties.name: Rose & Crown English Food
properties.description: Rose & Crown English Food Don't go for the food, but it's a good beer selection, sports on tv, interesting night events, comedy, music. Locals. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Royal Court Tavern
properties.description: Royal Court Tavern Love a window seat over looking Sloan Square. Great place for a beer before a taking in a play at the Royal Court Theatre. by dougnboston From the guide: Kensington/Chelsea Crawl - London

properties.name: Russian River Brewing Company
properties.description: Russian River Brewing Company Forget the grapes! This is where to go in Sonoma Wine Country!! Pliny the Younger is one of the best beers in the world and available for a short time. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Breweries in the World!!

properties.name: Seven Stars
properties.description: Seven Stars Over 400 years old, maybe the oldest pub in London. Don't take the cats seat! A must visit pub. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Smokeless Joe
properties.description: Smokeless Joe Wide selection of global beers as well as a stong local selection. Nice food selection too! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Standings
properties.description: Standings Fun sports bar ... Red Sox friendly in the middle of NYC! Above Jimmy's No. 43 and next door to Burp Castle. Oh yeah! by dougnboston From the guide: NYC the way I like it

properties.name: Star Tavern
properties.description: Star Tavern Another pub with fantastic atmosphere. Friendly people. by dougnboston From the guide: Kensington/Chelsea Crawl - London

properties.name: Stillen Genieter in Mechelen, Belgium
properties.description: Stillen Genieter in Mechelen, Belgium VERY laid back. The list has over 300 beers! Some rare and old. The owner pictured here will most likely be on a stool reading the paper. Knock if closed :) by dougnboston From the guide: Mechelen, Belgium

properties.name: Stones Public House
properties.description: Stones Public House Haunted, it's a terrific old, old bar with a great vibe. Big working fire place. 8 taps and a good bottle selection. Love the wings. Music many nights. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Sunset Grill
properties.description: Sunset Grill Like 100 beers on tap and wonderful wings! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Taco Mac
properties.description: Taco Mac Oh boy ... selection galore! Found several fresh Belgians on tap! Loved their wings. Service was very good. Well worth the trip. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Tap House Grill
properties.description: Tap House Grill A fantastic selection of high quality brews. A friendly staff that knows beer. Like the food too! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Tap Room
properties.description: Tap Room Great place at the base of Vail in Vail Village. Lots of fun!! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: The Chicken Bone
properties.description: The Chicken Bone Good beer selection, even a couple Belgians in bottles, but the BEST wings around. Several styles and three levels of hot. Both boneless and bone in. Great!! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: The Duke Of Wellington
properties.description: The Duke Of Wellington You can find a cozy corner for time with friends. by dougnboston From the guide: Kensington/Chelsea Crawl - London

properties.name: The Fat Belgian Restaurant
properties.description: The Fat Belgian Restaurant Nice Belgian beer selection at this bar/restaurant. Several Belgain taps and lots of bottles. Clean and modern inside takes away from the atmosphere a litlle. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: The Fox & Hounds
properties.description: The Fox & Hounds A tiny backstreet amospheric place that is really worth a visit! by dougnboston From the guide: Kensington/Chelsea Crawl - London

properties.name: The Jerusalem Tavern
properties.description: The Jerusalem Tavern Just found this one ... heck it's only been around since the 1100's ... Small but very nice, great servers and a St. Peters brand bar. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: The Publick House
properties.description: The Publick House In Brookline, MA: Great beers and fantastic Mac & Cheese! Dave, the owner, was knighted in Belgium for his work with beer. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: The Surprise
properties.description: The Surprise A very comfortable pub with personable staff. Good fun time potential in this house. by dougnboston From the guide: Kensington/Chelsea Crawl - London

properties.name: The Tourist Club
properties.description: The Tourist Club Be ready for a hike (really!), but when you get to The Tourist Club you'll be rewarded with a big sunny deck and freshly tapped beers. Check for open times. by dougnboston From the guide: San Francisco Treats

properties.name: Toronado
properties.description: Toronado Funky, hippy styled spot. You gotta know your beer and order with confidence. Great spot with a groovy crowd. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Trappist
properties.description: Trappist Great Belgian beer selection! Love what they've done with this place, laid back, easy going, staff that knows beer. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Trappistenhuis
properties.description: Trappistenhuis Gent is full of amazing bars and this is one not to miss. Open multi room place adds to it's charm. Best spot to get all the Trappist brews. by dougnboston From the guide: Gent, Belgium

properties.name: Trinity  Brewhouse
properties.description: Trinity Brewhouse Quality beers in Providence RI by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Union Station
properties.description: Union Station Quality beers and a good menu. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: Ye Olde Cheshire Cheese
properties.description: Ye Olde Cheshire Cheese An historic old pub, a visit back in time. Oliver Goldsmith, Mark Twain, Alfred Tennyson, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, and Dr. Samuel Johnson were regulars! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: d.b.a. New Orleans
properties.description: d.b.a. New Orleans Like it's NYC sister bar, a laid back special beer bar (with a full bar). by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: d.b.a. New York
properties.description: d.b.a. New York Very solid selection of beers. It's a funky kind of place, easy and relaxed. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: de Garre
properties.description: de Garre A Brugge (bruges), Belgium classic! Don't miss it and don't pass on the house beer (comes with cheese). Smallest street in Bruges and hard to find. by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!

properties.name: t' Brugs Beertje
properties.description: t' Brugs Beertje A must visit when in Brugge. Daisy, owner, will likely be your server. Fast and good service. Great mix of locals and tourists, all beer lovers. Classic bar! by dougnboston From the guide: Best Beer Bars in the World!!
